parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets text color on given Tree View Item

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''tvSetColor''' [idc, path, color]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of the item

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - Item text color

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''tvSetColor''' [path, color]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of the item

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - item text color in format [r,g,b,a]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvSetColor]] [101, [0,0], [1,0,0,1]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[tvSetColor]] [[0,0], [1,0,0,1]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvDelete]], [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvValue]]
</value></part></template>

</dl></root>
